嶈嶈嶈

嶈字的基本解释

嶈
qiāng
〔嶈嶈〕象声词，水激石的声音，如“扬波涛于碣石，激神岳之嶈嶈。”

嶈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiāng］
［《廣韻》五羊切，平陽，清。］
见“嶈嶈”。

嶈字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶈； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页319第03
【廣韻】七羊切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】千羊切，?音槍。山高貌。　又山激聲。【班固·西都賦】揚波濤於碣石，激神嶽之嶈嶈。【註】嶈嶈，水激山聲。【崔琰·述初賦】倚高艫以周盻，觀秦門之嶈嶈。　【正字通】古借將，音義同。

嶈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嶈字的起名意思

暂无。

嶈
Basic explanation of words
嶈
qiāng
〔嶈嶈〕 onomatopoeia, the sound of water-induced stone, such as "Raise the waves on the stone, stimulate the 嶈嶈 of the mountain."
嶈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiāng］
["Guangyun" five sheep cut, Pingyang, Qing. ]
See "嶈嶈".
嶈
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶈; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 319 03
[Guang Yun] Seven Sheep Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Thousand Sheep Cut, Sound Gun. High mountain appearance.　The sound of the mountain is exciting again. [Bangu·Xidu Fu] Raise the waves on Jieshi to excite the scorpion of Shenyue. [Note] Suddenly, the water excites the sound of the mountains. 【Cui Yan·Shu Chufu】Looking at the masters of Qinmen by relying on Gao Jiao and Zhou Yu.　【Zhengzitong】Ancient borrower, with the same sound and meaning.
